examples: She bears a striking resemblance to her older sister.
Tiene un parecido sorprendente con su hermana mayor.
In striking contrast to their brothers, the girls were both intelligent and charming.
En sorprendente contraste con sus hermanos, las chicas eran inteligentes y encantadoras.
The similarities between the two cases are striking.
Las similitudes entre los dos casos son sorprendentes.
